data.persona: I am a parishioner of the church in the village.  The bishop speaks at the church once a week.  I go to the church to pray several times a week.
data.description:
You are in the Inside the temple.
The stained glass glistens in the sun. The pews are lines perfectly.
There's a pew, a stained glass, a Candle, an offering plate, a baptismal, and an altar here.
The priest in ornate robes and the petitioner are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.mid_motivation: I want to be comfortable as I listen to the priest's sermon for today.
data.long_motivation: I want to be pious and attend church services often so that I can go to heaven when I pass on.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: use hands to pray with altar

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: put offering of gold coins on offering plate

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: give attention to priest giving sermon
